headline: IFF Launches Enviva® DUO to Boost Poultry Welfare
summary: IFF (NYSE:IFF) today announced the launch of Enviva® DUO, a state-of-the-art direct-fed microbial (DFM) solution for poultry production. This innovative blend of two non-spore forming bacterial strains is designed to support the growth of beneficial gut bacteria during challenging conditions and encourage a favorable nutribiotic state ─ the interaction between nutrition, microbiome, and gut and immune function ─ for optimal bird performance.

content.title: IFF Launches Enviva® DUO to Boost Poultry Welfare
content.summary: IFF (NYSE:IFF) today announced the launch of Enviva® DUO, a state-of-the-art direct-fed microbial (DFM) solution for poultry production. This innovative blend of two non-spore forming bacterial strains is designed to support the growth of beneficial gut bacteria during challenging conditions and encourage a favorable nutribiotic state ─ the interaction between nutrition, microbiome, and gut and immune function ─ for optimal bird performance.
